name: answerVar
desc: The name of the answer post variable. This could not be empty and could be default for all polls
desc_trans: The name of the answer post variable. This could not be empty and could be default for all polls

name: category
desc: (Optional) When set: will select the latest poll from the given category (id)
desc_trans: (Optional) When set: will select the latest poll from the given category (id)

name: resultLinkVar
desc: (Optional) when using resultResource, this is the paramatername the snippet is looking for
desc_trans: (Optional) when using resultResource, this is the paramatername the snippet is looking for

name: resultResource
desc: (Optional) when set to a resource id, this resource will be used to show the poll results
desc_trans: (Optional) when set to a resource id, this resource will be used to show the poll results

name: submitVar
desc: A name wich is provided when posting a vote. This is needed to use multiple polls on one page. This could be the name of the submitbutton or a hidden field in the form
desc_trans: A name wich is provided when posting a vote. This is needed to use multiple polls on one page. This could be the name of the submitbutton or a hidden field in the form

name: tplResult
desc: The main result template for the latest poll view
desc_trans: The main result template for the latest poll view

name: tplResultAnswer
desc: The result template for the answers inside the outer view
desc_trans: The result template for the answers inside the outer view

name: tplVote
desc: The main form template for the latest poll view
desc_trans: The main form template for the latest poll view

name: tplVoteAnswer
desc: The form template for the answers inside the main view
desc_trans: The form template for the answers inside the main view
